data.question: What is the chemical formula of MOP-18?
What solvents was MOP-18 found to be highly soluble in?
data.answer: Chloroform, toluene, tetrahydrofuran, ethyl acetate, N,N-dimethylacetamide, and hot DMF

data.question: What is the purpose of the Forcite program in the MS Modeling package?
data.answer: To find out the reasonable structural model of the ambiguous coordinating ligands in the X-ray structure through geometry optimization

data.question: What was the observed weight loss of MOP-18 in the TGA analysis from 280 to 420 °C?
What was the critical factor for successful STM imaging of MOP-18?
data.answer: The degree of evaporation of solvent was critical to imaging

data.question: True or False: The STM images of MOP-18 showed significant image drift in all images.
What was the calculated weight loss for MOP-18 due to the decomposition of the organic links in the framework?
True or False: The self-assembled MOPs are immobile on the surface during STM scanning.
What was the purpose of using the Nanoscope E STM for MOP-18?
data.answer: To image the thin film of MOP-18 on freshly cleaved HOPG under ambient conditions

data.question: True or False: The coordinating ligands of MOP-18 include 12 DMF, 4 octanol, and 8 H2O molecules.
What was the observed weight loss of MOP-18 in the TGA analysis until 280 °C?
True or False: The geometry-optimized structure of MOP-18 by Forcite program perfectly matched the X-ray structure.
What was the calculated RMS value when superposing the X-ray structure and the geometry-optimized structure of MOP-18?
True or False: The geometry optimization of MOP-18 resulted in a structure with strange bond geometry and bad non-bonding contacts.
What was the main observation from the STM images regarding the mobility of MOP-18 on the surface?
data.answer: The self-assembled MOPs are mobile, and the motion of the STM tip is moving them as it scans

data.question: True or False: The first weight loss in the TGA analysis of MOP-18 was due to the evaporation of solvent.
What was the main challenge in STM imaging of MOP-18 related to solvent evaporation?
data.answer: When STM imaging was attempted at shorter times, no ordered self-assembly was observed due to the high mobility of MOPs on the surface

data.question: True or False: The coordinating ligands and guest molecules contributed to the first weight loss observed in the TGA analysis of MOP-18.
What was the main finding from the TGA analysis regarding the stability of MOP-18?
data.answer: The weigh loss from 280 to 420 °C was due to the decomposition of the organic links in the MOP-18 framework

data.question: True or False: The STM imaging of MOP-18 was performed under vacuum conditions.
